settings.testimonial: "I've worn these amazing undies the whole way through my pregnancy & they have been so bloody comfy and fitted me perfectly as my body has grown."
settings.author: Olivia S

settings.testimonial: “Vee underwear are so soft and comfy - perfect for me to do my workouts in as they’re breathable and don’t cut into me!.”
settings.author: Holly B

settings.testimonial: "I put Vee to the test for my weight sesh & hot yoga workout üßòüèΩ‍‚ôÄÔ∏è Not only were they moisture-wicking and breathable, bamboo is good for the environment."
settings.author: Alexia E

settings.testimonial: "Oh my! I was given these amazing underwear for a Christmas gift and I cannot believe how much I love them! They are so incredibly comfortable and very stylish ;) Would never go back to any other type."
settings.author: Maddy D

settings.testimonial: Nothing but LOVE for Vee!! The gorgeous (and witty) packaging made me smile, but my smile grew larger when I put my first pair on. The bikini fit is a down right pleasure to wear daily. The fit is very flattering and comfortable, and washes well. Sooooooo breathable!!"
settings.author: Megan J

settings.testimonial: "I love bikini cut underwear and these have been the best I have come across. Super soft, light and beautifully fitting. I love them so much I was hand washing because I wanted to wear them again by the next day üòÜ"
settings.author: Rachel S

settings.testimonial: "I’m a big G-string lover but these bikini cuts I’ll happily put on any day! So comfortable, breathable and no visible panty lines! Beautiful edges and feel fab! And sustainable!? HUGE fan!!"
settings.author: Meg J

settings.testimonial: "So so happy with my recent purchase of Vee's Bikini cut underwear. It is extremely soft and comfortable, I can hardly tell I am wearing them! Great product and I will be buying more for sure :)"
settings.author: Sibel U

settings.testimonial: "I’m all about comfort when it comes to my underwear & I have to say, the Vee g-string is one of the comfiest pieces of underwear I’ve worn. The material is super soft, it fits really well and looks good, all whilst being sustainable and breathable for my lady bits!"
settings.author: Stephanie

settings.text: Vee Underwear is made of eco-friendly antibacterial, antifungal, breathable, odour-resistant and moisture-wicking bamboo fabric. And because it’s sustainably grown and ethically sourced, it’s good for your vagina and the planet.

settings.title: Healthy
settings.text: Made from eco-friendly bamboo which embodies natural properties that make the fabric antibacterial, antifungal, breathable, odour-resistant and moisture-wicking (woah). All these properties help to support a healthy lower region.

settings.title: Comfortable
settings.text: We don’t believe in tight seams, relieving you of bad undie-symptoms like over-hanging. Best of all, bamboo fabric is soft, super soft. Our fabric also includes a little elastane, for the days you need some extra stretch (we’ve all been there).

settings.title: Sustainable
settings.text: Bamboo requires little water & is the fastest growing plant in the world. Not to brag, but it also has no natural pests, which means it can grow without the use of any pesticides or herbicides. Oh, & it’s biodegradable… okay, now we’re bragging.

settings.subtitle: BUNDLE
settings.title: 5 for $85
settings.text: Just add the code 5FOR85 at check-out to receive a grand discount of $14.75, plus FREE shipping.
Want to WIN a $100 top drawer overhaul? Spread the hoo-ha love on Instagram. Snap, share & tag.

settings.title: Where do you ship to?
settings.text: We are currently set-up to shimmy out orders Australia wide, pronto. We do offer international shipping for our babes overseas, it's just a touch more spenny.

settings.title: How long will my order take?
settings.text: Your new Vee's will land in your top draw 3 - 7 business days after placing your order.

settings.title: My order has not arrived?
settings.text: Oh no, that is not ideal. There is a savvy tracking code included in the shipping confirmation email we sent you. Butt, if it's been more than 10 business days and your order has not arrived please contact info@veeunderwear.com and we'll look into it for you.

settings.title: Do you offer returns?
settings.text:
Due to hygiene reasons we do not accept returns on underwear.

To ensure you choose the right size, we recommend utilising our fabulous size chart. 

If you’re not convinced Vee Underwear are going to be the comfiest, and most overachieving underwear you’ll ever wear, you can get the goss and read all Vee’s reviews here.

We take every measure to ensure that our production standards are both ethical and quality assured, checking it once and checking it twice. However, if you do receive a faulty item, please contact us immediately so we can personally resolve the problem.

We know you're going to love your Vee Underwear but if for any reason you have any issues, please do let us know so we can sort it out for you info@veeunderwear.com

settings.title: What are the benefits of bamboo fabric?
settings.text: Our favourite question - we could go on forever - best to read our about bamboo page.

settings.title: You're out of stock, help!?
settings.text: This is a great problem, it means that there are many happier, healthier hoo-ha’s out there. But, not so great if you are wanting to place an order asap! If we are out of stock feel free to pre-order and receive 10% off automatically, and there will be a new order arriving very soon. Feel free to email us at info@veeunderwear.com with any questions.

settings.title: How Do I care for my Vee Underwear?
settings.text: To get longevity out of your overachieving Vee Underwear it’s best to use a lingerie bag and wash on a gentle machine wash setting. You should also use weak/mild laundry detergents on bamboo fabric. Oh, and don’t tumble dry, they don't like that.

settings.title: How often should I replenish my underwear?
settings.text: Research shows that alike sleep and bed wear, underwear has an expiry date before bugs such as E. coli and dust mites start to flourish, leading to an increased risk of UTI’s, thrush and allergies...eh.  Over time, even Vee's overachieving antibacterial, antifungal and moisture-wicking bamboo fabric powers can't ward off that e-coli’s unrelenting wrath. Which is why we recommend replenishing your top draw every 6 – 12 months.

settings.title: How do I know which size to order?
settings.text: Vee’s pretty true to size (she’s good like that). For example, if you were a size 12 pant, you should be a 12 in our undies. We also have a fabulous size chart for some extra reassurance if you fancy a double-check.

settings.title: You don‚Äôt have my size?
settings.text: As it's still early days for Vee, we don’t have the order quantities to stock every size. But please reach out and let us know what size you’re after and lets see what we can do info@veeunderwear.com

settings.title: Where are Vee products manufactured?
settings.text: Vee Underwear is brought to you by an Aussie-grown team of Melbourne gals. And our overachieving undies are sustainably and ethically made by our stellar team in China.

settings.title: How does Vee support the environment and sustainability?
settings.text:
I don’t know if you’ve heard, but we use eco-friendly bamboo fabric to make all our products. You can find all the juicy dets on why bamboo is sustainable and how we weave bamboo into our ultra-comfy fabric here.

We also do our vee-ry best to opt for sustainable alternatives wherever possible, from recycled resources to biodegradable packaging.

settings.title: I‚Äôm interested in becoming a Vee stockist?
settings.text: Cool. Drop us a line, we’d love to hear from you info@veeunderwear.com

settings.title: I‚Äôm interested in a collaboration?
settings.text: All ears. Hit us up info@veeunderwear.com

settings.title: I've got a PR/media enquiry?
settings.text: Love those. Shoot through an email info@veeunderwear.com

settings.title: Contact info
settings.text:
GF@veeunderwear.com

251 Johnston Street Abbotsford, VIC 3067
